verses.verse: And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Speak <S%H1696><s%> unto the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto <S%H3068>them<s%>, I am Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%>.

After the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, wherein ye <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>, shall ye not <S%H6213>do<s%>: and after the <S%H4639>doings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, whither I <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, shall ye not do; neither shall ye <S%H3212>walk<s%> in their <S%H2708>statutes<s%>.
Mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%> shall ye <S%H6213>do<s%>, and my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> <S%H3068>therein<s%>: I am Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%>.

Ye shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>; <S%H834>which<s%> if a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%>, he shall <S%H2425>live<s%> in <S%H3068>them<s%>: I am Jehovah.
None of you shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H376>any<s%> that are <S%H7607>near<s%> of <S%H1320>kin<s%> to <S%H1540>him<s%>, to uncover their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, even the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, shalt thou not <S%H1540>uncover<s%>: she is thy <S%H517>mother<s%>; thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.
The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%> shalt thou not <S%H1540>uncover<s%>: it is thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H269>sister<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, or the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>, whether <S%H4138>born<s%> at <S%H1004>home<s%>, or <S%H4138>born<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, even their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%>.

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, or of thy <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, even their <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%>: for <S%H2007>theirs<s%> is thine own <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.

The <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, <S%H4138>begotten<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, she is thy <S%H269>sister<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H269>sister<s%>: she is thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s near <S%H7607>kinswoman<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H269>sister<s%>: for she is thy <S%H517>mother<s%>'s near <S%H7607>kinswoman<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H251>brother<s%>, thou shalt not <S%H7126>approach<s%> to his <S%H802>wife<s%>: she is thine <S%H1733>aunt<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H1121>daughter-in<s%>-law: she is thy son's <S%H802>wife<s%>; thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of thy <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>: it is thy <S%H251>brother<s%>'s <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>.

Thou shalt not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of a <S%H802>woman<s%> and her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>; thou shalt not <S%H3947>take<s%> her <S%H1121>son<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, or her <S%H1323>daughter<s%>'s <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>; they are near <S%H7608>kinswomen<s%>: it is <S%H2154>wickedness<s%>.

And thou shalt not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> to her <S%H269>sister<s%>, to be a <S%H6887>rival<s%> to <S%H1540>her<s%>, to uncover her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>, besides the other in her <S%H2416>life-time<s%>.
And thou shalt not <S%H7126>approach<s%> unto a <S%H802>woman<s%> to <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness<s%>, as long as she is <S%H5079>impure<s%> by her <S%H2932>uncleanness<s%>.
And thou shalt <S%H5414>not<s%> <S%H7903>lie<s%> <S%H2233>carnally<s%> with thy <S%H5997>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>, to defile thyself with <S%H2930>her<s%>.

And thou shalt <S%H5414>not<s%> give any of thy <S%H2233>seed<s%> to make them <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the fire to <S%H4432>Molech<s%>; neither shalt thou <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of thy <S%H430>God<s%>: I am <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.
Thou shalt not <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2145>mankind<s%>, as <S%H4904>with<s%> <S%H802>womankind<s%>: it is <S%H8441>abomination<s%>.

And <S%H5414>thou<s%> shalt not <S%H7903>lie<s%> with any <S%H929>beast<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> thyself <S%H802>therewith<s%>; neither shall any woman <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> a <S%H929>beast<s%>, to lie <S%H7250>down<s%> <S%H8397>thereto<s%>: it is confusion.

Defile <S%H2930><s%> not ye yourselves in any of these <S%H428>things<s%>: for in all these the <S%H1471>nations<s%> are <S%H2930>defiled<s%> which I cast <S%H7971>out<s%> from before <S%H6440>you<s%>;

And the <S%H776>land<s%> is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>: therefore I do <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> thereof upon <S%H776>it<s%>, and the land vomiteth <S%H6958>out<s%> her <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%>.

Ye therefore shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%> and mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, and shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> any of these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>; neither the <S%H249>home-born<s%>, nor the <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourneth<s%> among <S%H8432>you<s%>;

(for all <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H8441>abominations<s%> have the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%>, that were <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H776>you<s%>, and the land is <S%H2930>defiled<s%>);
that the <S%H776>land<s%> vomit not you <S%H6958>out<s%> <S%H2930>also<s%>, when ye defile <S%H6958>it<s%>, as it vomited out the <S%H1471>nation<s%> that was before <S%H6440>you<s%>.

For whosoever shall <S%H6213>do<s%> any of these <S%H8441>abominations<s%>, even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that <S%H6213>do<s%> them shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Therefore shall ye <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4931>charge<s%>, that ye <S%H6213>practise<s%> not any of these <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H2708>customs<s%>, which were <S%H6213>practised<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2930>you<s%>, and that ye defile not yourselves <S%H3068>therein<s%>: I am Jehovah your <S%H430>God<s%>.
